book.author: Gambardella, Matthew
book.title: XML Developer's Guide
book.description:
An in-depth look at creating applications 
      with XML.

book.author: Thurman, Paula
book.title: Splish Splash
book.description:
A deep sea diver finds true love twenty 
      thousand leagues beneath the sea.

book.author: Knorr, Stefan
book.title: Creepy Crawlies
book.description:
An anthology of horror stories about roaches,
      centipedes, scorpions  and other insects.

book.author: Kress, Peter
book.title: Paradox Lost
book.description:
After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg
      Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems 
      of being quantum.
